Documentation for the Code¶

Classes¶

class app.classes.LogInForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

The class is for log in forms

class app.classes.RegistrationForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

This class is for user registratiom forms

class app.classes.User(username, email, password)¶

This class captures users on our page

class app.classes.UserBL¶

The class has the business logic layer for Users credentials

SIFT¶

exception app.sift.Error¶

Base class for other exceptions

exception app.sift.NotNewsSiteError¶

Raised when website is not a major news website

app.sift.find_better_coverage(url)¶

Returns top 5 Google search results for article topic/claim excluding search results from original source’s domain and untrusted sources

app.sift.google_query(query, num_results=10, header={'User-agent': 'your bot 0'})¶

Pulls all links from first page of Google query

app.sift.investigate_source(url)¶

Code that investigates source from a article URL website. Returns summary about news source (domain) from Wikipedia and the news source’s own about page.

app.sift.retrieve_article_details(url)¶

Returns title, summary, and text, given a URL to a news article

app.sift.reveal_source(url)¶

Extracts domain names from given URL

Credibility Model¶

app.credibility_model.domain_model(title)¶

Predicting how real an article is based on the top 10 domains obtained by google searching the title

app.credibility_model.encode_link(link)¶

Encodes domain names based on vocab

app.credibility_model.google_query(query, num_results=10, header={'User-agent': 'your bot 0'})¶

Queries article title on google and returns domain of top 10 results

app.credibility_model.pos(pos_list)¶

POS tagging

app.credibility_model.predict_count(text)¶

Predict based on count vec model

app.credibility_model.predict_credibility(text)¶

Predicts the credibility score of given article, weighted average of countvec model and tfidf model

app.credibility_model.predict_tfidf(text)¶

Predict based on tfidf vec model

app.credibility_model.preprocess(df_total)¶

Preprocessing article text : avergae length of sentence, frequency of tags, POS tagging

app.credibility_model.process_data_count(text)¶

Process data for count_vec model

app.credibility_model.process_data_tfidf(text)¶

Process data for tfidf model

app.credibility_model.sentiment(text)¶

Returns negative sentiment score and warns user of highly negative text :param text: text from article :return: negative sentiment score

app.credibility_model.text_features_model(text)¶

Predicting how real an article is based on psycolinguistic, lexical and syntactic features of the article text

Input: Article Text Output: Percentage of how real the article is

test_unit.test_existing_user()¶

test_unit.test_find_better_coverage()¶

test_unit.test_register()¶
